author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
Looks like vscode also removed some trailing whitespace

Fix https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/4917

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/5210/files?w=1 can be use to hide the whitespace only changes.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @iSazonov I think I got all of them.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: Well, this turned out to be a much bigger set of changes than originally anticipated, but @iSazonov I appreciate your attention to detail.  I think I got them all and reviewed them with https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/5210/files?w=1

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
@SteveL-MSFT Many thanks that now we have nice copyright strings!

Please clarify (it seems I already asked):
1. We have Microsoft Copyright in most files and MIT for the Repo - is there a conflict? CoreFX has MIT copyright in all files and Repo. We have both  Microsoft Copyright and MIT in LICENSE.txt and MIT in README.md.
2. What copyright should we add in new files or shouldn't?

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT

title: use consistent (c) for copyright symbol
